name: 林敬皇
objective:
雲端 (Cloud) 與物聯網 (Internet of Things, IoT) 重塑了整個計算世界對於事物的運行方式。除了為各行業提出了新的前沿應用外，也衍生更多在兩者融合對於管理、資訊安全與隱私保護等不得不重視的課題。本課程主要討論雲端與物聯網相關的安全性問題，包括由物聯網衍生出來的新威脅、弱點及兩者融合的相關安全議題。引領學生具備發展雲端與物聯網安全的重要觀念與技術，進而可以分析、設計與規劃未來物聯網與雲端運算融合之應用、與安全管理。
Cloud and the Internet of Things (IoT) have reshaped the way things are performed across the computing world. In addition to proposing new cutting-edge applications for various industries, there are also more issues that must be paid attention to in the integration of the two, such as management, information security and privacy protection. This course mainly discusses the security issues related to cloud and the IoT, including new threats and weaknesses derived when the two technologies converge. To lead students to understand important concepts and technologies for cloud and IoT security, and then to able to analyze, design, plan application and implement security management of the integration of the cloud and IoT.
